oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Guy Clark - 2006-09-09 - set two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: First of three Artist in Residence performances by Guy Clark from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 9, 2006. Set two of two. Special guests include: Verlon Thompson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Guy Clark; Verlon Thompson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Picasso's Mandolin (begins in progress) -- Stuff That Works -- South Coast Of Texas -- Randall Knife (off mic) -- Anyhow, I Love You -- Rita Ballou -- Boats To Build (with Verlon Thompson - vocal) -- We Ain't Been Everywhere Yet (Verlon Thompson - vocal) -- He Left The Road (Verlon Thompson - vocal) -- Joe Walker's Mare (Verlon Thompson - vocal) --She Ain't Going Nowhere (Guy Clark - vocal) -- Tornado Time In Texas -- Dublin Blues -- Encore -- Better Days -- That Old Time Feeling -- Analog Girl.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Clark, Guy; Thompson, Verlon; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
